data.actual_result: DM opens, DM list jumps to somewhere random that is not the location of active DM.
data.expected_result: DM opens, DM list jumps to location of active DM.
data.short_description: DM list jumps to random location instead of active DM when messaging someone through Activity tab.
data.steps_to_repro: - In DM list find anyone that already has a DM opened and is not visible in DM list without scrolling down. - Go to Activity menu. - Try to message anyone.
